synopsis: A widow falls for a guy who bears a striking resemblance to her late husband.
tagline: She lost her perfect love... until she found his perfect double.
casting: ['Annette Bening', 'Ed Harris', 'Robin Williams', 'Jess Weixler', 'Amy Brenneman', 'Linda Park', 'Jeffrey Vincent Parise', 'Eli Vargas', 'Horacio Cerutti', 'Clyde Kusatsu', 'Miguel Pérez']

synopsis: Sung-soo has everything a man could want: a beautiful wife and children, a comfortable home and luxury car, and plenty of money in the bank. When he learns that his estranged brother, Sung-chul, has gone missing, haunting memories of their troubled past urge him to visit his brother’s apartment in search of answers.
casting: ['Son Hyun-joo', 'Moon Jeong-hee', 'Jeon Mi-seon', 'Kim Won-hae', 'Jeong Joon-won', 'Kim Su-an', 'Kim Ji-young', 'Lee Jun-hyeok', 'Noh Susanna', 'Ki Joo-bong', 'Lee Young-suk', 'Ju Seok-tae', 'Kim Hye-yoon', 'Uhm Ji-sung']

synopsis: More than 20 years ago, there were three “Ban Dou(street banquet)” master chefs who dominated the catering business in Taiwan. However, the street banquet business has been in decline since Taiwan’s economic boom. Master Fly Spirit wants to pass the family recipes and culinary skills on to his only child, Wan, but she desperately wants to run away from the family business and to become a film star.
casting: ['Tony Yang', 'Lin Mei-shiu', 'Hsia Yu-chiao', 'Bamboo Chen', 'Ko I-Chen', 'Jieh-Wen King', 'Tuo Hsien', 'Pong-Fong Wu', 'Hsi-Sheng Chen', 'Yen-Tso Chen', 'Love Fang', 'Lee Lieh', 'Ma Nien-Hsien', 'Yang Li-yin', 'Tzu-Chiang Wang']
compagnies_production: ['Ocean Deep Films', '影一製作所股份有限公司']

synopsis: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.
